Description.Chinese:
将接近海盗红的粉红色替换为玫瑰色。
将绿蓝色替换为中浅绿色。
将脏黄色替换为真正的黄色。
还将默认颜色从青色更改为暗红色，将默认颜色由蓝色更改为橙色。
Description.English: Replaces the pinkish color, which is to near to pirate red, with rosa (AI OMara). Replaces the green-blue color with middlelight green (AI Hunt). Replaces the dirty yellow with real yellow (AI Willie). Also changed default color from Qing to dark red and default color from Smith to orange.
Description.French: Replaces the pinkish color, which is to near to pirate red, with rosa (AI OMara). Replaces the green-blue color with middlelight green (AI Hunt). Replaces the dirty yellow with real yellow (AI Willie). Also changed default color from Qing to dark red and default color from Smith to orange.
Description.German: Ersetzt das dunkle Pink, was zu nah an dem Rot der Piraten ist, mit Rosa (KI OMara). Ersetzt die grün-blaue Farbe durch ein mittelhelles grün (KI Hunt). Ersetzt das schmutzige geld durch richtiges gelb (KI Willie). Ersetzt außerdem die Standardfarbe von Qing zu dunkelrot und die von Smith zu Orange.
